name: Can't see if it is enemy or ally!
name_original: Can't see if it is enemy or ally!
description:
Commander! Our sensors are broken and soon we won't be able to recognize friendly ships! I hope, that they won't be visible too late.

IMPORTANT: The black screen after loading is absolutely correct behavior. Please be patient.

KEYS: Left click - cannon, right click - gravity gun.

Okay guys, this is our first attempt to Trijam and we are shocked that we did our game in ONLY 3 hours. We were able to finish all mechanics, but there was no time for effects and other stuff. Anyway, hope that you will enjoy our game! :)
